title: full screen stuck in full screen
content: why does my firefox browser 91.0.2 stay in full screen when i go into full screen. I can't get out of full screen. I used the windows key to try to close firefox but it doesn't work either. I have to force shutdown laptop to get out of full screen by shutting down pc. How can I fix this problem?? Thank you in advance.
creator: janbrayshaw

title: can't use new version of Firefox.
content: Kept seeing notices that my version of firefox was obsolete, so downloaded new version. Now, notices say I cant use new version because I need Mac 10.12 and I have only 10.11.6. Why did it download? How doI fix this? Can I back up to old version? Might be able to go to 10.12, but that might be messy.
creator: bermudabob
